vulnerability.name: USN-4146-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4146-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in ClamAV. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that ClamAV incorrectly handled unpacking ZIP files. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause ClamAV to crash,  resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2019-12625)   It was discovered that ClamAV incorrectly handled unpacking bzip2 files. A  remote attacker could use this issue to cause ClamAV to crash, resulting in  a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2019-12900)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in ClamAV. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
